definition: to give to/to provide to/to bring to/to take to
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)

sentences.english: However the market economy system has brought about a strong dash to the heating supply of the cogeneration.
sentences.chinese: 市場經濟體制帶給熱電聯產向採暖供熱以猛烈衝擊。

sentences.english: There are uncountable examples of how the bandage of love brings us catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 談到愛的纏裹帶給我們的災難，更是俯拾即是。

sentences.english: The fruit did bring death to humankind.
sentences.chinese: 智慧果會帶給人類死亡。

sentences.english: To not follow the truly humane will bring immeasurable harm.
sentences.chinese: 要是不親熱有仁德的人，那將帶給咱們如許大的壞處。

sentences.english: What's more, Self-drive traveling can bring people a lot of fun.
sentences.chinese: 而且，自駕遊能帶給人們很多樂趣。

sentences.english: Success can make you go one of two ways.
sentences.chinese: 成功只會帶給你兩條路。

sentences.english: Then in both places the rise of nongovernmental organizations gives us real hope.
sentences.chinese: 在貧富國家中都出現了非政府組織，這帶給我們希望。

sentences.english: This is what I give you a second note, the day before yesterday evening Tuoren Dai to you.
sentences.chinese: 這是我給你的第二張字條，前天晚上託人帶給你的。

sentences.english: "Not many things contribute to our happiness more than generosity," says Tal Ben-Shahar, Ph.
sentences.chinese: 比慷慨更能帶給我們幸福感的事情並不多。

sentences.english: Mr Ball has just called on Ms Zhu to give her a message.
sentences.chinese: 鮑爾先生剛剛來拜訪朱女士，帶給她一個口信。

sentences.english: Above all, we need to bring bottom-line value for the client.
sentences.chinese: 總之，我們需要將真正的價值帶給我們的客戶。

sentences.english: Focus on the certifications that give you the most bang for the buck.
sentences.chinese: 將注意力放在那些能夠帶給你最大收益的認證上。

sentences.english: Mr. Sandman bring me a dream.
But the easy money also brings a slew of unexpected problems.
sentences.chinese: 但這容易賺入的錢也帶給意外問題的扭轉。

sentences.english: He can take these flowers to her.
End up with custom scenery photography gives me inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 最後得到的風俗風物攝影帶給我的啓示。
